medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent episodes of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain correlated with fatty meal consumption.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started two days ago after eating a meatball sub. The patient has a history of recurrent RUQ pain associated with fatty meals.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Essential hypertension; previous laparoscopic tubal ligation.
